Guest Molecules.Mechanism: Proton hopping through hydrogen-bonded networks with crown ether cavities

Other Information.Additional Info: Water molecules form hydrogen-bonded networks facilitating proton conduction via Grotthuss mechanism.

Experimental Validation.Method: Two-terminal and transmission line geometry-based devices

Other Information.Additional Info: Polymer retains 23 wt% water at 25% RH; proton conduction arises from adsorbed water forming hydrogen-bonded networks.
